DOC.brief_summary: This is an non-comparative study. There is no statistical hypothesis. The effects of extension of treatment on bleeding will be recorded and described.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Bleeding With Extended Administration of an Oral Contraceptive
DOC.criteria: Healthy women Age 2540 History of regular cycles Current or recent (within 2 months) users of hormonal contraceptives Contraindications for use of hormonal contraception Conditions which affect the absorption or metabolism of steroid hormones BMI > 35
